tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meeting_agendas (
    agenda_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_title VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    meeting_topic TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_minutes (
    minutes_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    minutes_description TEXT,
    minutes_action_items TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MeetingMinutes (
  minute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
  attendance_status VARCHAR(50),
  minutes_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_agendas (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    meeting_topic VARCHAR(255),
    agenda_items TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_minutes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    meeting_topic VARCHAR(255),
    minutes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    is_present BOOLEAN,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meeting_agendas(id)
);

CREATE TABLE action_items (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_description TEXT,
    assigned_to INT,
    meeting_id INT,
    deadline DATE,
    is_completed BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (assigned_to) REFERENCES attendees(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meeting_agendas(id)
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_participants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meeting_agendas(id)
);
